CustomTileSplitter.description: Intelligent image tile splitting node. Supports automatic padding to fit 8x multiple dimensions, and synchronous slicing of Latent and Image.

overlap.name: Overlap Pixels (px)
overlap.tooltip: Overlap area between tiles. Automatically uses 1/8 of tile size when set to 0.

force_multiple_of_8.name: Force 8x Multiple Padding
force_multiple_of_8.tooltip: If True, automatically pads the image edges to meet VAE compression requirements and avoid edge artifacts.

0.name: Config
0.tooltip: Core configuration data, must be connected to Merger node.

1.name: Image Tiles (Batch)
1.tooltip: Tile images in Batch Tensor format.

CustomTileMerger.description: Multi-mode tile merging node. Supports Laplacian pyramid blending for Hollywood-level seamless stitching.

tile_config.name: Tile Config
tile_config.tooltip: Must connect to the Config output of Splitter node.

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip: Recommended to use Gaussian or Laplacian. Laplacian mode is computationally intensive but preserves the best details.

feather_percent.name: Feather Ratio (%)
feather_percent.tooltip: Controls the softness of blended edges.

processed_tiles_image.name: Processed Image Tiles
processed_tiles_image.tooltip: Receives tile images in Batch or List format.

processed_tiles_latent.name: Processed Latent Tiles
processed_tiles_latent.tooltip: Receives latent tiles in Batch or List format.
